title.rendered: Khuda Haafiz: Chapter II – Agni Pariksha

content.rendered:
Directed by Faruk Kabir

Written by Faruk Kabir

Star Vidyut Jammwal(Sameer Chaudhary). Shivaleeka Oberoi(Nargis Chaudhary). Dibyendu Bhattacharya(Rashid Qasai). Sheeba Chaddha(Thakur Ji (Sheela Thakur)). Riddhi Sharma(Nandini Chaudhary). Rajesh Tailang(Journalist Ravi Kumar). Shubham Somu Srivastava(Doctor)

Language Hindi

Producers Aditya Chowksey. Husaini Hasnain. Sanjeev Joshi. Zafar Mehdi. Ram Mirchandani. Abhishek Pathak. Kumar Mangat Pathak. Santosh Shah. Pragya Singh. Yogesh Tevatia

Production Cinergy. Panorama Studios. Zee Studios
